Writer: Raj Nidimoru (story and screenplay), Krishna D.K. (story and screenplay), Sita Menon (story and screenplay), Chintan Gandhi (Hindi dialogue), Raja Sen (Hindi dialogue), Sita Menon (Hindi dialogue), Shabbir Ahmed (lyrics), Vaibhav Modi (lyrics)
Actors: Kunal Khemu, Boman Irani, Soha Ali Khan, Cyrus Broacha
Plot: A gangster deputes two of his men to recover money from an out of town compulsive gambler.
